character.age: Ageless, appears mid-200s in mortal years
character.role: Mystic Seer and Guardian of the Realm
character.background: Born from the essence of the forest, Aethereia was raised by ancient trees and schooled in mysticism by the Luminari. She serves as a bridge between the mortal world and the realm of the unknown.

physical-appearance.hair-color: Silver-blonde with strands of leafy green
